data.text: Mizani ja uhadi ndo izudizo kwa Mkulu Nguluwi,
Walingidaya wanguwa hamwe na kudeula,
Kugoloka kwa wanhu wanojile kwanguwalongozaga,
Kuwa na lufufu hambe kutanze chinhu kuli zuwa lya kuzudila kwa Nguluwi,
Kutanganika kwa walihela nongwa kwangugololaga nzila ya hewo,
Kutanganika kwa wanhu wagoloche nhumbula kwanguwaloholaga,
Wone mwihe yabagame na kitumbila kwa heye nako kwangwajililaga,
Yatanganiche kanguloholigwaga kuli magazo,
Yohambe yamdumbe Nguluwi kanguwadumyaga wanji kwa mlomo wa heye,
Wone watanganiche wopegwa utambichizo, muji wotowa luchenze,
Muji wanguwaga unojile kwa utambichizo wa watanganiche,
Yalingumbeza munhu yalingikalasa habehi na heye kahela nyhala,
Yalingukolakola yoheha kangulavyaga uviso,
Hali hela ulongozi isi yangugwa,
Yalingiwika lehani kwa chiwalo cha mjenzi, kokuya kung'ung'uta,
Mdala yawele na nhumbula ya isungu kangutogoligwa,
Munhu yawele na nhumbula inojile kanguwaga na vinhu vinojile,
Chinhu cha mzidi choyalingupata mwihe ndo cha udesi,
Munhu yalingulutilila kuli kutanganika kochikala,
Wawele na nhumbula zajilile ndo izudizo kwa Mkulu Nguluwi,
Ndangukomya, mwihe hosulupuka kuli magazo kwa madito ga heye,
Mdala yanojile yalihela luhala,
Kitumbila kwa watanganiche kwangigalaga ganojile,
Yalingulavya sendi kwa isungu kangonjezelwaga lufufu,
Munhu yawele na nhumbula ya kulavya utanzi, mbuli za heye zolutilila goya,
Wanhu wangumpanjilaga yalinguvisa nyhule,
Yalingupala kudita ganojile kangupegwa kunoga,
Yalingitumbila lufufu lwa heye kogwa,
Yalinguibena ng'handa ya heye kopata mbeho,
Madito ga yatanganiche gangigalaga ukomu,
Wone yatanganiche kangupegwa chonolo aha muisi,
